title.$t: Examples
Firestorm

content.$t: credits: The Guardian, description: An interactive multimedia piece on the Tasmanian Bushfires. You can read how Firestorm was made right here., linktointeractive: http://www.guardian.co.uk/world/interactive/2013/may/26/firestorm-bushfire-dunalley-holmes-family, screenshot: firestorm.png, patternsused: Simulate an event in the story;  Tell story lineary; Display large image in a page; design it as a magazine article

title.$t: Snowfall

content.$t: credits: New York Times, description: An interactive multimedia piece on an avalanche at Tunnel Creek. title.$t: Pontifficator

title.$t: Remittances

title.$t: Gay Rights in the US

content.$t: credits: Guardian, description: The handling of gay rights issues vary by state and follow trends by region.
